WorkItem.ClosedComment: We are multiple versions past this, if issue persists in Rawr4, reopen
WorkItem.Description:
Specs:
Rawr b3.0.3.21
Rawr.Mage
MAC OS 10.6.4
 
Reproduction:
- Run an optimization that will result in items that can be replaced.
- Hovering over "Optimized Gear" will results in pop-up window to display so that it is cropped off of the screen; information on the item is not readable unless you change size or position of Rawr window.
 
Possible Solution:
- Have pop-up windows for hover-over constrained to Optimizer Results pane; above or below item being hovered over.
WorkItem.Summary: [Mac] Optimizer Results Item Display during Hover-Over
